website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty machine is recognized for its handy features and multipurpose design.
pros: Includes three interchangeable blades for grating, shredding, and slicing
Works with cheese, vegetables, and nuts
Grating options range from fine to course
cons: Product has trouble staying in place despite bottom suction

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used this rotary cheese grater to grate cheese today, it works very fast and I can make the work done perfectly. We also use this round drum slicer to chop nuts, slice carrots and cucurbita pepo to make salad, it works very well, I will definitely do more things with it. It save me a lot of time when cooking! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: zhengyq

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: You can use it to grate the cheddar and nuts in a fast way ,I love cauliflowers ,It can transform into rice and to be grated for salads .But its a pain to chop or grate it into finer pieces as the crumbly cauliflower may go all over the chopping board and your hands.By using this tool ,it becomes very easy. A good deal and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Yinhui

customer_reviews.title: Good design and works well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I will see how long it lasts. I got this model even though I don't particularly like the color, because it said it was a "second generation" design. It has one large piece in the body vs two as the other models seem to have. It may be more durable as well. It works fine with beets which are very hard so it should be easy for other things as well. When you clamp it down on the counter it really sticks, which is important for stability. Blades are sharp enough as well. Easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Feed It, Crank It,Presto Grater/Shredder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to assist me in shredding a large quantity of carrots and cabbage, to make coleslaw for a church dinner. After reading some of the NEGATIVE reviews, I was hesitant about buying it and then after ordering it, I wondered if I’d wasted my money and wind up manually shredding until my fingers bled. Well, I was more than pleasantly surprised when my little yellow grater/shredder performed like a pro with just feeding the chamber and cranking the handle. It got the job done, and I only lost a small slither of one fingernail.😂
customer_reviews.author: Sheila J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I got this mainly so I can grate cheese efficiently ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly so I can grate cheese efficiently and it did the trick very well. You can grate 1/4 pound of cheese in about 15 seconds. I was able to finish 2 pounds of cheese in under 2 minutes by doing 1/4 of a pound at a time. Just make sure to clear the cheese after it is grated before you start the next piece or it squishes together and it takes some effort to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: FunBacon

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I looked hard for a parmesan cheese grater. It is difficult to use. The vacuum suction does not hold. Good idea but not especially effective. My parmesan is imported and hard, wanted it grated easily. It worked hard at the grinding and it would be easier if the suction worked. I did grate the whole wedge so I have to give it credit of being able to grind though the cheese . The handle is hard to attach to the grinding wheel. I expect softer cheeses will go better. Because the suction does not hold I can't give it more rating. I will use it until I am too frustrated and start looking for something else. Directions would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Silloway

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I love using it. Its easy to clean everything can go in the dishwasher. The only downside is the bottom is smooth. It should have rubber or something so it stays put. But its an easy fix. I still live it and use it often. Was fast and easy to grate carrots for my carrot cake. I would recommend this to anyone who cooks or bakes a lot
customer_reviews.author: Christine  Emro

customer_reviews.title: My task was harder, not easier.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, breakdown and clean, but didn’t make my task easier made it harder. The suction never gripped to the counter. I struggled to keep the unit in place while I cranked the slicer drum to slice up a few small potatoes. Felt like I was using a kids toy. This is very small if I was not using fingerling potatoes, I would have to chop the potato to fit into the chamber. If I’m chopping, I might as well go ahead and slice them by hand. Not for a larger tasks. Was very excited to put away my mandolin and use this handy unit but disappointed in the end. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Doodleberk

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic. Broke the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: The hopper broke the first time we used it. Cheap plastic junk. If you want something that will hold up buy a steel retro unit on the big auction site for the same money. That's what I'm going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT HESITATE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT HESITATE to buy this gadget -- it's WONDERFUL! I've used it to grate cheese and chocolate, and it's turned messy tedious jobs into quick tidy jobs! After each use, I've disassembled it in seconds, and put the parts directly into the dishwasher. MUCH easier to use and clean than my food processor! Don't hesitate to buy it -- you'll love it, too!
customer_reviews.author: CHP WebShopper

customer_reviews.title: plastic
customer_reviews.text: I used this 3 times and on the 3rd time a plastic piece broke off; not sure what it does because it covers a hollow area that serves no purpose, so it still works. My concern is if it will continue to break apart. I really liked the ease with how it shredds cheese and it is easy clean up. Just disappointed that a piece has broken off and concerned about its longevity. UPDATE: This company sent me a new Mandoline slicer and it has been working very nicely. I applaud the company for stepping up and providing me a new product. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this device for several weeks and I’m very pleased with it. The base locks very securely to your working surface,which allows you to apply considerable pressure to the handle for grating hard items like carrots or sweet potatoes. I would like a drum that allowed for thicker slicing, but it apparently is not an option. This machine is particularly handy for grating cheese and cleans up much easier than a box grater.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!  Terrific for a quick personal salad or for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was fast and awesome, a day early! The stainless steel blades work great ! I had an issue with the suction and the Customer Service was right on it! They communicated with me and replaced my BENWiSH - It is awesome with celery which is usually a pain to grate. The apples , carrots and zucchini work so fast. I will order others for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Mecham

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is not sturdy - Sent new one by vendor. Will see how it works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in May. It is now July. The spring came out of the handle, so it will no longer stay connected. Pieces have come off of the main clear, plastic part that holds everything. I hesitated, since it was all plastic (except for the drums). I would not purchase again. The vendor has contacted me. They asked for photos so they could make the product better and have sent me a new slicer. I'll see how this one works. I grate and slice a lot of vegetables for my dogs, so this will get a work out. I have updated to 3 starts for now, since the vendor was so responsive.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN L WHITNEY

customer_reviews.title: No more sliced fingers!!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom sliced the tip of her finger making chips on a potato mandolin. 😳😱😰. Freaky!!! I said that crap is not happening to me. I got this thing and now I have to get one for her. It is so awesome so consistent and can cut so many things. Love that it sticks to the counter also. Thanks for a smart gadget that is absolutely necessary in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jovonna D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: It's great for a lot of things but couldn't get cabbage to go through for cole slaw which is why I bought it in the first place but it's great for carrots, cheese, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use Time-saving Machine
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t use it for cheese yet. But for vegetable, it is so easy to use. It helped a lot for making salad at home, even my kid can help enjoying the fun. I didn’t get any problem assembling it. But if you get it, please be careful when cleaning the grater part by hand!
customer_reviews.author: Lilizzzz

customer_reviews.title: We Love your slicer
customer_reviews.text: We Love your slicer. It feels good using it. It does a great job. We use it mostly for grating cheeses. It is easy to clean, and the parts are easy to assemble and disassemble. It is solid and stable once set up, and the suction base holds it on the counter top securely. The color is cool too! Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Windsleigher

customer_reviews.title: Did not have any luck with this grater
customer_reviews.text: Nice grater for the money. Sadly, I was unable to get one to work properly. Had to return it. This one is working better but the 'fine' drum still needs to be sharper to grate properly. This company has outstanding customer service, and is very responsive to customer issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. O.

customer_reviews.title: Grates frozen things nicely IF you baby things along
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for its price point...Product is plastic (except for the drums which are easily bendable tin-alloy). The handle where it attaches to the body isnt the best design (and my biggest GRIPE). You really need to baby that handle and NOT bare down hard on cranking the handle or you'll snap it off. But at its price point, it does exactly what I expect it to do. I WOULD NOT buy this thing if you plan to use it daily or weekly. Find a more Commercial option. But for an item I grab and use maybe 4 times a year, and didn't cost me +$100 in commercial kitchen construction...its a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very useful
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good alternative to slicing vegetables by hand but this didn't work very well. Hard to apply consistent pressure on the vegetable and get even slices. My cucumbers came out in long thin pieces rather than evenly sliced circles. Don't think I'll use it again. Might even give it away so I don't have to store it. Food prep the old fashion way works best. Gadgets just take up space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer ks

customer_reviews.title: The size is just good: neither too small nor big
customer_reviews.text: The size is just good: neither too small nor big. The suction base can gripe tightly to the marble top when chopping peanuts and slicing potatoes, it does the job perfectly just by turning the handle without no much effort, easy to clean, my mom loves this round drum slicer very much.
customer_reviews.author: Hadddd

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this much earlier.
customer_reviews.text: I needed it go grate cheese. Experimented with sharp cheddar and it worked very well. Sticks to the counter top. Comes with 1 slicer, a large grater and a fine grater.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The blades are dull and the vacuum suction base doesn’t work, which makes it very difficult to use. It’s a piece of junk. Don’t waste your money. EDIT: The company got in touch with me about me being unsatisfied. They sent out another grater to me that the lock work on. It worked very well. I recommend this product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: I needed this (and you do too)
customer_reviews.text: What a terrific device! I've used a number of different cheese graters and none are as efficient and effective and FAST as this one. It'll grate a pound of Parmesan in just a few seconds - easily! My brother does a lot of Italian cooking and I've watched him working so hard to grate his cheese. I'm sending one of these to him and I know he'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product is made well, easy to use. Granddaughters love to chop veggies for grandma. I have used it so often since I got it. It is so much easier to clean than my food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Schramel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and would be a great gift for someone! It is very light, but for the deal you get that is to be expected. It took both my husband and I to actually grate the block of cheese because the base kept moving around and almost tipping over. Once we got the block started it went much easier and didn't make me want to throw it out! LOL Overall a good value for the money if that is a concern and be a cute gift!
customer_reviews.author: MCH

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do, however, as others have complained, the suction to keep it stable is a joke. I tried 10 different surfaces and none worked as it should. I probably will McGuiver it since I bought it for my wife and she likes it regardless of the bad suction cup. Item is strong and should last a long time. Easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.Roman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This little mandoline is a quick and easy way to shred or slice vegetables. The blades are sharp and the different parts fit together really well. The upper part unlocks/locks easily from the base, and the handle snaps into the cutting drums nicely, too. All in all, a handy and easy to use kitchen tool. I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year
customer_reviews.text: Good design, terrible materials. It's nice that it did last a year and for that year, it was great. But this kind of plastic cannot hold up. Things like this do not need to be disposable. We don't need poorly made products that just end up in landfills. Make things to last and I'll pay a bit more for it. Anyway the mechanism in the handle broke so every time we try to turn the handle to grate cheese it pops off.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Morris

customer_reviews.title: Most Useful Tool In My Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This small machine is very useful. It works very fast and convenient. Today I used it to make some potato slices for BBQ. It really helped a lot, as I can save more time preserving the chicken wings and pork. It is also very easy to clean: just put it under tap, the water takes everything out! Deeply recommend this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it made shredding cheese quick and very easy. Threw parts in dishwasher for easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this cute little kitchen helper. While I've only had the opportunity to use it once so far, it made shredding cheese quick and very easy. Threw parts in dishwasher for easy cleanup. Cant wait to try it on nuts and veggies! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jking

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure Yours Is New When Opening
customer_reviews.text: It came pretty quick in the mail, works really easy, just had one issue that I should've taken a picture of but I didnt open it, my girlfriend opened it while I was in the shower. When she opened it, there was carrots in the push down area to feed the wheel grater. Looked like it had been used and returned. By the time I came out, she had already washed it and was sitting in the sink. Other than that, I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christensen French

customer_reviews.title: You can never go back to life without it.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on my Facebook newsfeed and immediately ran to Amazon to see if I could find it at a better price as always (I did, by far)....unlike many novelty purchases done on a whim, this one was a game changer. I ended up buying one for our cabin as well because one just can't go back to regular shredded with a cheese grater after you use this and realize you can do an entire block in like 20 seconds. It is seriously one of the coolest kitchen gadgets I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Turner

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese grater/cucumber slicer ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This grater has saved me so much time and energy!!!! I use it to grate fresh cheese and slice cucumbers. I was manually grating these everyday and it was killing my neck...this is by far the best gadget I’ve purchased in a long time. Super easy to use and clean up is literally 30 seconds...I would give this more stars if I could!! Must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: jaelynandkylee

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Update***** The company has replaced my broken machine, and the new one works great. Really awesome customer service!!! 5 Stars now!!! I bought this machine in October. I have used it 5 times, and now it is broken. I can't return it because i'm outside of the return policy. Complete junk.Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Veerkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction to Countertop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother-in-law for her birthday. It's a little smaller than I expected (which I like). I has a powerful suction cup that works great on flat counters. So far she's used it on cheese and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shredder! It’s cheap and easy to use. The suction doesn’t work on my tiled counter top. However, I just use a cookie sheet. It’s perfect because if I make a mess (and I usually do) it’s easy clean up. I only wish it were a little taller. I always make a mess because I shred Costco size cheese blocks into a little bowl and transfer that to a bigger bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei

customer_reviews.title: Large amount shredder
customer_reviews.text: For a large amount of shredded cheese, it's great. If u have to 'set it up' for a small amount, it's faster to just grab your old, flat shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Ret Leo

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is exactly what I expected and am pleased with it. This makes cutting veggies efficient and easy. The suction works very well. Once I engage the function the base does not move :-) This product is easy to disassemble and clean. There is one con, the body is plastic and I wish it was made of 'heavier' material. Overall, extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Blue

customer_reviews.title: Hey can I just buy a replacement handle?!
customer_reviews.text: So I loved this grater.. yea some cheese sticks but it all depends more on the temperature of the cheese and what kind... all to say I loved it until I put it together one night for my husband to use and he so sweetly managed to break the spring in the handle!!! Everything eles works but not the handle which is a must!!! Hey! Do y’all sell just the handle?? That’s all I need!!! Thanks!! Loving wife!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom as a gift and she absolutely loves it. She says it gives her more control when processing things like walnuts and pistachios than an electrical food processor does. She called me after she used it the first couple of times to tell me how happy she’s with it. I’m happy when she’s happy. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Ami S.

customer_reviews.title: I've used this Slicer now several times and really enjoy the ease
customer_reviews.text: Carrots, Zucchini, plant-based cheese- all grating is great. Easy to clean- I just disassemble and throw parts in the dish washer on the top level. I don't like the slicing attachment- the slices are too thin for my needs, but the shredding without including my own skin has been a God Send!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for ricing soft vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I have a child with texture/taste issues. I bought this to rice a variety of vegetables so they would be too small to cause issues or set aside. It works great on most vegetables but not hard ones like carrots or frozen ones. It arrived with a non functioning handle do I contacted the vendor via Amazon they very promptly replaced the part. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Carolina Villaseca

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for mom!
customer_reviews.text: This round drum slicer runs without electricity, so you can use it anywhere you want! It can be used for fine, coarse grating/shredding and slicing! Easy to install and easy to clean it after using it! It had sharp blades so it can grate and slice large quantities of ingredients in a short time! Saving slot of cooking time! Really safe to use it! I think it is a great gift of moms!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap, you have to be careful when you ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, you have to be careful when you use it because the handle flys off every time you try to shred the cheese and the shredder falls out. Then if you have too much cheese in there it has a cracking plastic sound.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Functionality via simplicity!👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical. I watched a girl use one on youtube. I thought this has to be easier than my Kitchenaid processors (13 cup n mini). I was right. Simple set up. Very practical and functions flawlessly. It real hugs the counter too. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jos m.

customer_reviews.title: Did last.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this little grater but it broke.. I use it to make cold slaw and while grating cabbage it broke. Haven't had it long. This is an updated review. After my earlier negative review, the manufacturer offered to replace the item free of charge. I have received it and am very pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: Is this as sturdy as the classic aluminum versions of this type of grater? Of course not. But, if you dont cram stuff in it with a lot of force, I don’t think it’ll break. The suction works great on my “formica” counter.
customer_reviews.author: Astute Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool product!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool grader. Takes a little longer to set than a traditional grader but works 10Xs easier and faster. Having it pieces can be challenging too because you can misplace a grader size, but over works great!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Fleener

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little grader. Does the job it’s supposed to do. Only reason I gave it 4 stars was because it comes unstuck when grading cheese or slicing vegetables. Easy to clean and assembled. I do recommend to anyone who doesn’t want to get a food processor because this does the job just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Boom Boom POW

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Round Mandoline Vegetable Slicer works perfectly in my kitchen. It saves me a lot of time and works in the Kitchen and makes my life much easier. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder, slicer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to grate blanched almonds for Kranskakes. Worked like I needed it to for my recipe. Also used for slicing almonds, not perfect slices, but good enough. It has a nice suction base which holds unit in place while turning crank. A winner unit for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: easily cut hash browns, fried onion strings, carrots...shredded cooked beef...etc. Cleanup is quick, and best of all it is really hard to cut your fingers off with the blades inside. will buy again as gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Good grater
customer_reviews.text: I like this cheese grater but a piece broke off on the second use. Fortunately it's not anything that affects the function so I can keep using it regardless. Outside of that little issue, I do like this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have a big kitchen aid food processor and i hate shredding cheese in that because around the rim cheese gunks up all around it's terrible and hard to dig out. I love this because it is so easy to use shreds my hard cheeses so well. Cleans up in a jiffy I will never use that food processor again for cheese.
customer_reviews.author: C.w.C.♥

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: Fast Service, thanks! I love, love, love it! Only going to give it 4 stars because it's not as good as the old all metal vintage kind. It's plastic, it works super great but don't force it, again its frame is plastic. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Babb

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gizmo.does all I needed it to and is very easy to clean. The seller gives 5 star service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until handle broke-UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: This grater seems well built and worked like a champ, but the clip within the handle broke after just a few uses. The handle is no longer clipped onto the drum which renders it unusable. I have attempted to find a way to contact the manufacturer for a replacement part, but cannot find any contact information. Update-2-3-2019 the vendor read my review and sent me an email indicating they wanted to correct the issue. They provided me a new handle at no charge and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: scott chunn

customer_reviews.title: Easier
customer_reviews.text: I find the parts slightly irritating to clean but that’s always the case with a sliver, and it’s crank handle is much easier to use and faster than a standard style that you have to manually grate with hand motion
customer_reviews.author: Pancake

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tools for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I bought for the kitchen. Every Friday we have homemade pizza where I make 4-5 pizzas for the family and friends. This tool has saved me lots of time shredding cheese. The suction is good but make sure you wet the rubber under the tool before you lock it on you kitchen counter. If you make many dishes that requires shredding cheese, this tool is a must.
customer_reviews.author: googhie

customer_reviews.title: Only real thin slices.  No fried potatoes from this item.
customer_reviews.text: They only slice real thin. If, you want fried potatoes - forget it. It will hold very good on a counter top. Not real durable but, if you are careful it will probably last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: You have to press whatever you're trying to cut so hard, like i recommend if you have strong hands but for the average person so, just spend a bit more and get the one with a button. Like, i have bruises on my hands from having to press that hard to get the thing to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: This is simply amazing how simple it is to use. Wonder how we did without it before. Easy to setup, to use and to clean. No regret at all, perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlysc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: High quality, super easy to clean and cuts perfectly. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Marc B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been all my life? I love this thing!!! It does a great job grating, shredding and slicing. I can't believe I didn't realize these existed at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using this tool is easy and clean up is a snap.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is incredible. It works really good for slicing things like carrots and shredding cheese. It is so easy to use and clean up is a snap. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: wimpy
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to other reviews, although this one did sound better than other similar products. This grater is not for root vegetables - it was only a matter of time, although I was pretty careful, before the handle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This slicer is so adorable and retro looking. The suction mechanism on the bottom is really useful, and it's very easy to take apart and clean. Over all very easy to use and I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I did break a piece off somehow, but I have no idea where it goes. Only downfall is that it’s not easy to use since it doesn’t have any kind of grip on the bottom. It slides around on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Towery

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the grater! I'm the only one who will grate anything for recipes in my house and my old box grater hurt my arm and hands to use. This has been a game changer for me! It's so easy to use and clean. Best $25 I've spent in a long time! And the company checked in with me to see how I liked the product - that's great customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest to durability yet, but this grater is very easy to use, very easy to clean, and even looks nice in the bright color. I have had Zyliss in the past, which is much stiffer - not a problem if one has powerful hands, but I do not. I have also had an IKEA, which is much less sturdy than this one, though also easy to use and clean. This is my favorite of the three.
customer_reviews.author: Becky O

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product. I just want to the customer service ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product. I just want to the customer service department. I had trouble with the housing on the product and they were very helpful and when it could not be resolved, they sent me a new which work just like it was advertise. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of veggies, this one totally works for me, the slice and grate do the great job. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jian T.

customer_reviews.title: This is a neat little grater.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little grater. Perfect for grating cheese grinding up crackers or cookies for piecrust. The only drawback is it’s not dishwasher safe so you have to hand wash it but for the job it does it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love my new veggie slicer. Easy to use and clean. Would definitely purchase this item again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love to Read

customer_reviews.title: It seemed to work pretty well other than that and the price was reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. I rated it four stars because the suction cup did not stay in place once I started trying to slice vegetables. It seemed to work pretty well other than that and the price was reasonable. So thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: great price / works really well.
customer_reviews.text: THIS Is honestly a nifty little tool... My husband came back from a dinner with her Italian daughter in law and wanted me to order one and then I didn’t quite know how to do it so I asked her to do a video and now we been shopping and having a bar with this thing is really quite easy... I’m ordering several as gifts
customer_reviews.author: Olivia D Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love it but handle broke
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but the spring in the handle came out and now I can’t use it and see no option to contact the seller. So upset I used this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie9583

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment for Cheese lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cheese grater! I haven't tried anything else yet but I can shred an entire block of cheese in minutes, with minimal effort and no finger cuts!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Argueta

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and I would have given it 5stars but it broke in less than 6mo ☹️ The clear part broke where the handle attaches
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie M

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Shredded carrots great. Was kind of hard to take apart. Front little clear piece broke off the first time I used.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Duffin

customer_reviews.title: Bad value
customer_reviews.text: This broke the second time I used it. I didn't even bother to return it, I threw the darn thing in the trash!! Don't go with plastic, go with metal.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Kynion

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Works perfectly, easy to clean and grates things quickly.
customer_reviews.author: zelda1

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, works well for now but doesn't seem very durable
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it isn't as durable as I had hoped. A little piece broke off the first time I used it for cheese. It is not going to affect its use though.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Allcorn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been able to use this product for several things it makes it easy to slice vegetables and cheeses. I would recommend to anybody who wants easy slicing. Also, it’s very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: keeping it sharp
customer_reviews.text: This is a most in the kitchen you will slice your vegetables or in no time .

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use a chopping machine, can cut different look, I like it very much, especially save my cooking time

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer and so amazing! I wish I bought it 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Werzinski

customer_reviews.title: Used Once
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this item to grate Parmesan cheese it broke. I threw it in the garbage. Too many items are made with cheap plastic today. 3/21/19 I changed my rating to 3 stars because the seller reached out to me and offered a replacement at no charge. Good customer service from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget works great! Easy to assemble and take apart for cleaning. When I first received it, the box had two fine shredders and no course shredder. I contacted the company directly and they promptly sent me a course shredder without me having to return the whole thing. I am very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wall

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place suction not good.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it works if the suction would work. Still can use it but not easy seeing as how it moves.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Clever little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is pretty nice. So much better than tearing up your fingers on a regular shredder
customer_reviews.author: kelly green

customer_reviews.title: Tried 4-5 shredders, this solved my problems
customer_reviews.text: Tried a variety of cheese shredders before this - powered (Cuisinart), flat, etc. This works the best, easiest, quickest. Seller doesn't want the main unit run thru the dishwasher, requires hand washing, but the functioning is what matters.
customer_reviews.author: bgroves2908

customer_reviews.title: I can’t live without it
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE this easy to use machine, esp for grating. My daughter wanted one for Christmas. She loves hers too. IT WORKS GREAT

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is strong and the idea of this is genius. But the quality isn’t great after a few uses.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and was just good purchase for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Buy one! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: Oh you need one of these in your life!! Easy to use and clean up is quick. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quick!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! SO quick and easy. Had a little trouble getting it to stick even with adding water to the bottom but overall good little shredder

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I use it all the time, mostly to make nut flours. It's so easy to clean.

product_meta.title: Round Mandoline Drum Slicer Rotary Cheese Grater Veggie Slicer Vegetable Carrot Shredder Nut Chopper
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueBenwish round mandoline vegetable drum slicer manual shredder is an efficient kitchen tool with 3 various drums: fine, coarse grating and slicing which will totally speeds up the process of preparing food without hassle.

Running without electricity, exempt the troubles to pull the wires anywhere in the kitchen, setting a variety of functions in one, this round drum slicer will keep your kitchen tidy and save many precious cup-board space.

Suitable for grating cheese, carrot, cauliflower, nut, cabbage, breadcrumb, zucchini, radish and so on, you can use this round mandoline slicer make the hash browns, cauliflower rice, salads, coleslaw, baked puddings and pizzas freely.

A strong suction base holds the rotary cheese grater in place during use and is engaged by sliding the lock around the middle of the body. The angled design allows grated and sliced food to dispel quickly from the vegetable mandoline chopper.

ROUND DRUM SLICER FEATURES:
- 3 different easy interchangeable high quality stainless steel drums for coarse and fine grating, slicing
- Powerful non-slip suction feet for stability with easy release tabs
- Quick and effortless, easy to take apart for cleaning
- The rotary cheese grater is dishwasher safe in top rack

ROUND DRUM SLICER USAGE INSTRUCTION:
- Put the suction base on smooth clean countertop, then Lock by turning the knob clockwise.
- Install the feeding jar to the base by pushing inside till hearing a "Click".
- Put the slicing drum into the feeding jar and put it into end stop.
- Match the right direction of the handle and the end of the drum.
- Then lock the drum by insert the handle until hearing "click" sound.
- Press down the button to release.
- Put the food into the jar and push down the food pusher, then turn the handle to use.

ROUND DRUM SLICER SPECIFICATIONS:
- Material: Stainless steel, BPA-Free ABS Plastic
- Size: H9.5 x W4.5
- Color: Blue
feature_bullets: HEALTHY AND USEFUL - This round drum slicer blades are made of high quality stainless steel, other parts are made of food grade BPA-free ABS plastic, this round mandoline slicer is safe for your health when grating cheese, fruits, carrots, potatoes, radish, cauliflowers ricer, nuts, chocolate, cabbages, breadcrumbs, cookies, pumpkins, etc.

EFFORTLESS AND SAFE - With a big hopper and sharp blades, this round drum slicer can grate and slice large quantities of ingredients in a short time without hand hurt, this vegetable mandoline chopper is really a good tool in your kitchen
MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS IN ONE TOOL- This round drum slicer has 3 easily interchangeable drum blades for different cooking choice, including fine, coarse grating/shredding, and slicing

HUMANITY DESIGN- A suction base grips securely to clean, smooth areas for effortless grating with a simple turn of the handle, the round drum slicer sits diagonally, so the grated pieces fall out from this rotary cheese grater by themselves, reduces any clogging

SPACE SAVING AND EASY CLEANING- Performs the tasks of multiple kitchen tools in one, this round vegetable slicer take up little precious cupboard and bench space. This cauliflower nut chopper is easy to be disassembles for easy cleaning, what's more, this round mandoline slicer is washable in top rack of dishwasher
